Reviews.Title: Better quality than what's included in camera kit
Reviews.Author: Kelsey Bates
Reviews.Content: Order this to replace a cable that was damaged during installation (wife shot staple through it). I was surprised to see this is a much higher gauge wire than what the zmodo DVR kit included and the overall video quality is better. If ordering again I would just opt for a full upgrade and go with the coax cable over this RCA style.

Reviews.Title: No issues
Reviews.Author: Dave.
Reviews.Content: No much to write about this cable.  It works for my security cameras and have had no issues for several months.

Reviews.Title: Nice price !
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I had to move a camera that was installed too far from the shop. I did have the original but at the price if I need all i have to do now is  all set for the next camera system.

ProductInfo.Features:
Video and Power Cable for Zmodo CCTV Security Cameras
60 Feet Video & Power Cable in Black Color
CCTV cable with BNC Plugs
Pre-Made BNC Video - Power(2.1mm) Cable
External Indoor and Outdoor use
ProductInfo.Name: Acelevel Premium Quality 60 Feet Video Power BNC RCA Cable for Zmodo CCTV Security Cameras
